Enter "Every touch achieves a purpose. It is to give uniqueness to a disguise that is about to break down definitively." Michele Petrelli is an artist with more than twenty years of activity, his art delivers both objects and human forms in an analytical, detailed way; but, at the same time, it transcends and abstracts the hidden, universal idea from the concrete particulars, exceeding the slavish realism. Petrelli’s pictorial style can be compared to a bright, personal expressionism of our time. About... MICHELE PETRELLI There is no one here. There is nothing to elevate, nothing to heal. The truth is implacable. Everything that happens is governed by blind necessity. The Universe is not benevolent or hostile: It is neutral. What manifests must dissolve. This is not nihilism. We are the Field: amoral Consciousness. Art does not heal.
